TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 控件中存储选定项。A stores the selected items in a control. 存储在 中的项是包含在 中的项。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 存储 中显示的所有项目。The stores all items displayed in the . 下表显示了一个示例，说明了 如何在示例 控件中存储 的项以及这些项的选择状态。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |IndexIndex|项Item|ListView 中的选择状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|已选定Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Tuple.item4Item4|已选定Selected| |44|Tuple.item5Item5|已选定Selected| 根据上表中的 示例，下表演示了 的显示方式。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |IndexIndex|ListViewItemCollection 中的选定项Selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-------------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Tuple.item4Item4| |22|Tuple.item5Item5| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 利用 方法，您可以确定 类中的项是否为 的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定项在 中的位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、 事件和 成员以及 类。The following code example demonstrates using the , event, and members and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体中，其中包含一个名为 `ListView1` 的 对象和一个名为 `TextBox1`的 。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用 `InitializeListView` 方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or the event handler. 此示例要求事件处理程序与 事件正确关联This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 中 的键。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数 `null` 或空字符串， 将 `false`返回。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns `false`.

span.span: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将多个集合中的选定项组合到一个数组中。You can use this method to combine the selected items from multiple collections into a single array.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以确定 控件中的选定项的数目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the control. 然后，可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并且需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非 的 属性设置为 `true`，否则此属性始终返回零（0）或一（1）的值，具体取决于是否有选定项。Unless the property of the is set to `true`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.

span.span: If the item is not located in the collection, the return value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦知道项位于选定项集合（使用 方法）后，就可以使用 方法来确定项在 中的位置。Once you know that an item is in the selected item collection (using the method), you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the .

summary.span: 返回具有指定键的项的第一个匹配项的索引。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 中 的键。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数 `null` 或空字符串， 将返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果连续调用 ，则最后返回的索引将首先检查键匹配项，如果没有匹配项，则从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
